checked-value.description: The value of the selected state

unchecked-value.description: The value of the unchecked status

checked-color.description: The color of the selected state

unchecked-color.description: The color of the unchecked status

readonly.description: Whether it is read-only or not

ripple.description: Whether to turn on the water ripples

rules.description: Validation rules, which return 'true' to indicate that the validation is passed, and the rest of the values are converted to text as user prompts
rules.type: 验证规则，返回 true 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示
rules.description_zh: 验证规则，返回 `true` 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Clear the bound value (set to 'unchecked-value') and validation information
methods.description_zh: 清空绑定的值(设置为 `unchecked-value`)和校验信息

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the selected state, pass 'checked-value' to be selected, 'unchecked-value' to uncheck, and not to pass or in other cases to negate
methods.description_zh: 切换选中状态，传 `checked-value` 为选中， `unchecked-value` 为取消选中，不传或其他情况为取反
